dialogues.text: Good. Keep it that way. It's good for business, and he's become quite a star, hasn't he? He's young, and we've got all the time in the world. Robert watches Angel as she continues dressing. He GRABS her by the hair and pulls her to him, yanking he back, lifting her face to his.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You're not getting star struck, are you? Angel tries to shake her head, but Robert has her held to tightly.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You don't forget who trained you, and Darkcloud, Night Stalker and the others, do you? Again, she tries to shake her head, but cannot.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Good! He kisses her brutally, then lets her go, pushing her bac clothes.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Let yourself out. I have a meeting. He exits the room, and Angel wipes her mouth with the bac hand, trying to get the taste of him off her. There is real anger in her eyes as she continues dressing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grandfather is drilling Jack in qi cultivation. They are sticking hands, and Grandfather talks while they drill.

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: The key to using qi is your waist and legs. You can use your opponent's energy against him, by sensing the attack and reacting immediately, before he hits you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: Attack me. Grandfather closes his eyes, and Jack throws a punch at h looks like it is going to hit him, but at the last minute Grandfather avoids the punch, redirects the force, then c at Jack, throwing him back about 3 feet.

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: I am talking about spontaneous reaction. Your body has a field around it, and when an attack comes, you feel it. Jack looks at Grandfather, and he knows Jack doesn't unde

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: Hold out your hand. Grandfather looks at the hand, then thrusts a pin into it it can go in too far, Jack YELPS and pulls his hand away.

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: Spontaneous reaction. See?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yeah, I see. They start sticking hands training again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three SuperFighters, Budokai, Night Stalker and Darkcloud duking it out with an Asian gang (5). They beat them hand

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You're out of business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is fighting in the ring, and at one critical moment fight, he tries to use the qi training he is learning. It work, however, and Jack is SLAMMED by the other fighter, Stalker. Surprised, Jack moves away from him, trying to recover. F he finishes off Night Stalker, then raises his hands to t The applause is deafening. Jack turns to all corners of the crowd, and smiles at Sal Angel watches him closely, and sees the look he gives Sal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is lifting weights with the other SuperFighters. Sev CLOSEUPS of SuperFighters training (men and women), their apparent. They are so big, and so emotionally on edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack working on his qi training with Grandfather. He is f by Jack's inability to concentrate, so he gets a machine machine generates lights and sounds, allowing Jack to con Jack puts on glasses, and does his meditation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, in the early morning rays of the sun, is doing a so Tai Zhi form. It's beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sticking hands. More Machine Jack working on moving the can. More machine. Grandfather turns off the machine and attacks Jack, who s the eye piece on. Jack is able to defend himself. He does notice that he cannot see anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is eating dim sum in Chinatown with Sally and Grandf Grandfather and Sally are busy ordering, in Chinese, and is very bored. Jack is sitting there trying to move a can of soda. An am appears for a split second (SFX), and the can jiggles a l Jack is elated.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: It moved! It moved! Grandfather looks at the waiter and shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: You bumped the table.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I'm telling you it moved!

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: All right, all right. It moved. We're ina restaurant, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd is going crazy, ready for the next SuperFight.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Next up... Darkcloud against The All American Hero!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is all dressed and ready to go for his next fight. H standing near the door, waiting for his introduction. The light sheen of sweat over his skin, and he can't wait to the ring. Robert and Angel appear at Jack's side.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Mr. Sawyer! How are you?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Jack, I want you to lose this fight. Jack smiles and nods, then does a double take. He stares Robert, looks at Angel, then decides that he's joking.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Good one, Mr. Sawyer.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: The decision has been made, Jack. You don't win this fight. I'm setting you up for a huge title match later. You lose to Darkcloud tonight. The crowd is chanting Jack's name. INSERT: Underground betting is going on here.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: Jack Cody! Jack Cody! Robert starts to walk away, leaving Angel standing there. looks at Angel, but she cannot meet his gaze.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Mr. Sawyer? Robert doesn't listen and continues to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Give it up for a fighter who needs no introduction, the ALLLLL AMERICAN HERO! The spotlight swivels around to find Jack, standing at th entrance to the locker room. It lights him up and the cro but he is still looking off towards Robert. Stunned. Finally, Angel edges him towards the ring, and he goes, of fog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is inside the ring, facing off with Darkcloud. Jack is losing, as he is supposed to. He is still in kind daze. Robert is in the crowd, and he looks a little concerned. Darkcloud clinches with Jack, and whispers in his ear.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Jack, man, you gotta make it look good. You gotta be beating me before you take the dive.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Why do I take a dive?

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: It's in the script. Jack breaks the clinch and still he is being beaten up. H taken down, and is in real trouble. Jack looks into the crowd and sees Sally, who has a very look on her face. Jack is filled with confusion, and gets slowly. They start fighting again, and now Jack begins to show so Robert, seeing the change, is relieved. The fight continues for a little bit, with Jack having th hand now. The fighters clinch again.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Good man. Let me catch my breath, then I'm gonna take you out.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You and what army?

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Don't try it, Jack, man. It ain't worth it.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I'm not going down. They break, and now Darkcloud is pissed. This was suppose his win. He charges Jack, intent on really taking him out Jack sidesteps the attack, and mounts his own. It's fast furious, and very dangerous. Jack uses some of the techni Grandfather has been teaching him.

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: She knows what Jack is supposed to do, and sees what he i She's not sure if she should be angry, or cheer his rebel Jack avoids Darkcloud's brutal attacks, and continues to finally sets Darkcloud up for the knockout blow. He pauses for a moment, looking first at Angel and then i crowd for Robert.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Don't do it. He smiles, then the CAMERA PULLS OUT and Jack KNOCKS Dark into oblivion.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Who is furious.

dialogues.speaker: TABLE
dialogues.text: Jack's contract SLAMS down on the table.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: See this contract? You signed it! You don't decide that you are going to win a match. I tell you to do something, and you do it. You hear me?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Nobody asked you to talk! Was I clear when I told you to lose the match?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Mr. Sawyer, let me explain...

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before I decided to train you, you were a box boy at a sporting goods store, for crying out loud. Now, you're a hero and you're famous. A pretty good deal, I think, and all I ask is for you to follow orders. Can you do that?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I think I can...

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Don't think, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You can count on me, Mr. Sawyer.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: (softening up) Jack, maybe we started off wrong. This is entertainment, and we want to give the audience a good show. Sometimes, that means we have to play with the outcome, make a fight better than it otherwise would be, right?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Good. Night Stalker and Darkcloud are leading a little expedition tonight, and I want you to go along, help out. OK?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: OK. I'm there.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Good. And Jack?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yes, Mr. Sawyer?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: No one disobeys me twice.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. Jack exits the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A restaurant sits on the corner of the street. It is clos for the night. A van pulls up to the front of the store, SuperFighters, Jack in tow, pile out and go into the rest

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group, led by Darkcloud, Budokai and Night Stalker, w the restaurant.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Don't sweat it, Jack. It was a lucky shot, anyway! Don't ever do that again. You won't live to see the sun. You understand?

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT STALKER
dialogues.text: It's humiliating to get reamed out, man, but at least you're still alive, bro.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yeah. What are we doing here?

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: The dirty work. You develop a taste for it, though.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Chinese food?

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT STALKER
dialogues.text: Yeah, right. Darkcloud goes up to the main counter and SLAMS his fist the glass, SHATTERING it into a thousand pieces.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Wang, you've been a bad boy.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: (to Jack) Wang is the head of the Tong down here, and he owes Robert a percentage. We're collecting.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I've eaten here before... WANG, a 40ish Chinese man, comes out of the back.

dialogues.speaker: WANG
dialogues.text: I already sent it to you.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Give it up, or we trash your place.

dialogues.speaker: WANG
dialogues.text: Trash? Darkcloud, in answer, KICKS the front of the display case SHATTERING it as well.

dialogues.speaker: TRASH
dialogues.text: Out of the back come three WAITERS, and they attack the SuperFighters, Jack included. Jack is forced to fight alo the SuperFighters, even though he knows that it's not rig on the other hand, these are Chinese criminals, so... They quickly win the fight, the Waiters aren't very good and corner Wang. Darkcloud holds Wang, while Night Stalker savages him. He hitting him over and over, and blood is everywhere. Jack turns away, not wanting to look at what they are doi Wang. Budokai grabs him and turns him back, forcing him t

dialogues.speaker: WANG
dialogues.text: OK, OK, I pay you, I pay you. Wang opens his cash register and pulls out all the money. it to Jack.

dialogues.speaker: WANG
dialogues.text: You are a customer here - why do you do this? Jack has no answer.

dialogues.speaker: WANG
dialogues.text: Take it all, I don't care. What do I tell the Tong when they come for protection?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Who is stunned by the man's words. He turns on Budokai.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I thought you said he was the head of the Chinese Mafia?

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: So, I may have overstated a little. It's no big deal. You have to go along anyway, you have no choice. They take all the money and then leave the restaurant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SuperFighters get back into the van, the destruction

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van that took the SuperFighters on the raid to Chinat up in front of the office building, and Jack gets out.

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams, Jack. The van door slides shut and the van takes off. Jack, st by the attack in Chinatown, walks slowly into the parking

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is getting into his Jeep, when he hears the sound of footsteps and SHOUTS. Jack ducks behind his Jeep and watc several of Robert's HENCHMEN SPRINT through the parking g

dialogues.speaker: HENCHMAN 1
dialogues.text: Where'd he go?

dialogues.speaker: HENCHMAN 2
dialogues.text: Over here! We've got him cornered! They run off, and Jack is too curious not to follow them. slowly moves around the corner and looks. And is stunned. There, surrounded by Jack's Henchmen is the Beast. Crazed wild. One of the Henchmen tries to grab onto him, and the Beast him, SLAMMING him and then discarding him.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Back away! Jack, alarmed at the sound of Robert's voice, pulls back the wall. Robert comes walking up with a man in a lab coa carrying a case. Robert pulls a keypad from his pocket and points it at th He pushes a button, and the collar around the Beast's nec Pain fills the Beast.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Rock, don't do this to me, man! He motions for the doctor, who opens the case and hands R tranquilizer gun. Robert takes the gun, loads it and aims at the Beast.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams. He fires, and the dart sinks into the Beast's neck. Almos immediately, the Beast calms down and starts to sink towa floor. Robert comes close to the Beast then, and kneels down nex

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I'm close, Rock. I'm really close. A couple more and I control it all.  The Beast shakes his head and roars.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yes! I say yes, and you will do it!

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Who reacts to the tortured cries of the beast.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I need you, Rock. And you need me. Robert stands up and motions for the Henchmen to come get Beast. Jack, sickened by the entire night, makes his way back to Jeep. He gets in and sits there, breathing deeply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack opens the door to his apartment, and he is immediate attacked. It is the Masked Man again, and this time Jack such an easy mark. They fight for a little while, and Jack is incredibly imp The Masked Man is losing. Jack manages to take the Masked to the ground, and rips off his mask. It is Budokai!

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You've improved.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You've seen, haven't you? You know what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yeah, I have. You were right.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You have to do something about it.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What, quit?

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: No, help me get him.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Get Robert Sawyer? How are we going to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting proof, and I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I just want out. I saw a Monster tonight.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You know who that is? Jack shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: Mike Rocco.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: No. Budokai nods his head.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: Sawyer's got us all on a mixture of steroids and mind control drugs. I know you're not taking yours, and I stopped taking mine, a little too late. Rocco was the first, but that's the future for all of us. Jack pulls out his necklace.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: This was Rocco's - he gave it to me when I was a boy. He was my hero, my inspiration.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: And he's now Robert's personal killing machine. Jack looks out the window for a long moment.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What do you want me to do?

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: Good man. We need proof - papers and testimony by both of us. Rousting some criminals isn't enough... PAN AWAY FROM THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN DOWN FROM SHOWERHEAD. Jack is in the shower, and we h rest of Budokai's dialogue, while Jack thinks about what

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: . we need the murders, the death matches and the drug dealing - the proof...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is meditating. He is having trouble concentrating.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACKS HERE
dialogues.text: Jack's Mother, Wang from the restaurant, Budokai, Sally, Grandfather, Angel, Rocco, Robert, etc.

dialogues.speaker: SPECIAL FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: The young boy from earlier in the movie (maybe several ti right after the other)

dialogues.speaker: BOY
dialogues.text: Are you really a hero? Finally, Jack opens his eyes and yell, throwing one very punch, smashing a large vase on the table to bits. He knows what he has to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is in Robert's office, and Robert looks very pleased

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I'm glad to hear you're with us. You are the elite. If Nietzsche were alive, he'd call you a Superman. A guy like you needs that excitement, that adventure. I need warriors I can count on.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You can count on me. When can we go out again, the whole team?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Soon. I'll let you know.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Good-bye, Mr. Sawyer. Jack exits the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack pulls up in his new Jeep and walks up the sidewalk t Mother's door. He knocks on the door, and his Mother come Over Jack's shoulder, we watch as Mother opens the door a Jack. She registers shock, and then starts to close it. Jack stops the door gently with one hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom. I need to talk to you - you... (beat) were right. They're trouble, and I'm trying to stop it. His Mother looks up at him, even more shocked. She wants happy to hear this, but she's also worried about her son.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Are you in danger, Jack?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Not just yet, Mom. We're gonna bring them down, though. Can I come in? His Mother smiles and opens the door wide, and Jack goes hugging her. His Mother starts to close the door, but Jac it and leans out of the door.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: There's someone I want you to meet... He motions to Sally, who is waiting in the Jeep. She gets runs to the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robert is sitting at a table with DarkCloud and Night Sta

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: We made quite an impression on Jack the other night. He wants in, as badly as we did.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: We've got a problem.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT STALKER
dialogues.text: We own the Italians, the Chinese, the Koreans, the Jamaican posse - what now?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Someone from inside, feeding information to the cops... Looks of surprise from Darkcloud and Night Stalker. Could us?

dialogues.speaker: DARKCLOUD
dialogues.text: You know who? Robert steeples his fingers and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, his Mother and Sally are sitting in the living room and getting along famously. The cellular phone in Jack's rings, and he excuses himself.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I need you tonight. Special exhibition, 7 pm.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: The Arena?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: No, it's a private affair. Come to Warehouse 14, off Columbia Avenue, not far from the office.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I know... (beat) that area a little bit, I'll find it.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: See you tonight. He hangs up and Jack stands there looking at the phone.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: What's up?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I won't know until 7 tonight... He goes back in and sits down in the living room, a littl now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are cars all around Warehouse 14, and people are go inside. There is a ring/cage set up inside, which is glim briefly as people pass through the heavy curtains at the Jack pulls up in his Jeep, and parks. As he is walking in warehouse, he spies Angel and goes over to her.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Angel! What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: What's happening to you, Jack? Why are you getting involved with that son of a bitch...

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Aren't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We all are, I guess.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What's going on tonight?

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: A cage fight, for the high rollers. She motions to the door, where huge FIGHTERS are checking credentials and invitations. One of the guys doesn't have right ID, and one of the Fighters THROWS him away from th

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: Robert wanted me to make sure you got inside...

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What's that mean, Angel? Angel doesn't say anything, but walks towards the door, a watches her go, thinking that he might be in trouble. If and he goes in, he's dead. If he's not, and he takes off, party's over. He shrugs and starts after her.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Hey, Angel, wait up! She turns and waits for him, unable to stop a smile from as he jogs over to her. They go through the door arm in arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and Angel walk in. There are people everywhere, and being made. Jack spots Robert on the other side of the ar

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Who's fighting tonight?

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: I don't know. They find a seat. The lights around the ring/cage go low, special lights around the rim of the ring/cage go on. The bright, lighting up the whole ring. Robert is in the cent ring, playing the part of the announcer.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Ladies and Gentlemen! Welcome to the famous 'Cage Match' - where only one man leaves alive. Tonight's bout pits Budokai... Budokai comes out towards the ring, and the crowd erupts applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against the Beast! Jack and the crowd watches in awe as the Beast is wheeled restraints towards the ring/cage.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAI
dialogues.text: He knows this fight is going to be the real thing. He wal the ring/cage, escorted by Darkcloud and Night Stalker.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Who's gonna win?

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: This one is for real, Jack. I really don't know. The fight starts, and the Beast is let out of the cage to Budokai. The Beast gets hit on the way in, but that doesn to phase it. Budokai circles, trying to stay out of the B range. The Beast is so quick, however, and so strong, that soon is trapped in a corner of the cage. Budokai mounts a furi assault on the Beast, but the Beast shrugs it off and att The attack is brutal, sadistic and bloody. Budokai is bei slaughtered, and the crowd is going crazy. This is what t to see, and they are getting their money's worth. Jack is watching, and he knows he has to act. He gets up over to where Robert is watching.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You gotta do something! He's getting hurt!

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: That's the reality of our business. It's brutal.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: C'mon, Mr. Sawyer. He could get killed.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Yes, he could. At that moment, in the ring, the Beast RIPS off a hunk of Budokai's shoulder, and stuffs it in his mouth. Jack REAC this, and the crowd, and Robert smiling. Jack's head is s and he knows that Budokai will be killed if he doesn't do something. He runs over to where Angel is sitting and YANKS her to h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me!

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Wait for me get into the ring, then kill the lights.

dialogues.speaker: ANGEL
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this, Jack? You're throwing it all away!

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: They're killers, Angel. I have to help him! Angel HOLDS for a moment, then nods her head and goes tow office. Jack, meanwhile, makes his way ringside. The Beast is on top of Budokai, and Budokai isn't even mo Jack jumps into the ring and SLAMS into the Beast, knocki off of Budokai and out of the ring. The Beast lands in the crowd, and starts ravaging the peo the crowd. The lights go out, and the warehouse is in chaos. Budokai is a bloody mess, and Jack HEAVES him up onto his and starts out of the ring. The Beast jumps back into the moves to cut them off. Jack faces off with the Beast, with Budokai over his shou

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Rocco! The Beast stops at the mention of his name. Jack pulls out the necklace that he always wears.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Rocco! I gotta get him some help. OK, Mike? He's done fighting. You won. The Beast lowers his arms, and Jack climbs back over the heads towards the exits. Robert is trying to see what is happening over the pandem and he catches a glimpse of Jack leaving with Budokai.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Rocco! Get him! The Beast turns to Robert and stares at him. He punches a on the keypad, and the collar around the Beast's neck glo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get Jack! Now! The Beast still doesn't move. More power to the collar, a the Beast is in agony. He still doesn't go for Jack, howe

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Do it. Instead of charging after Jack, the Beast comes for Rober

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: You won't hurt me. The Beast comes on, but Robert hits another button, putti collar up to the limit. The Beast stops his charge and go on his knees in total pain. Robert walks up to him and shakes his head. He hits the Beast and kills him immediately.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Told you. Robert is furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Budokai, bruised, broken and bloody, is laying on a bed i house. Sally is trying to clean him up, but a great deal has been done. Grandfather pushes her off to the side and lays his hands Budokai's chest. An amber glow comes off his hands as he apply his Qi (SFX), but it won't penetrate.

dialogues.speaker: GRANDFATHER
dialogues.text: He's almost gone, Jack. Jack comes to the bed and sits next to Budokai.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: Well, you got your proof. Take him down, you got that?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You're gonna get better.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: We both know that's a lie... He starts to cough, and blood comes out of his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: You get him, Jack. Grandfather takes Jack and Sally out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to help him. Focus your qi. Jack shakes his head, trying to concentrate.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: I gotta get my Mom. They know where I live.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: I'll get her. You stay here and help Budokai. Jack nods and concentrates. Soon, he is completely draine sits down heavily, leaning his head back and closing his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is sleeping on the couch in the living room, and som phone is ringing (0.S.). Jack starts to wake up, and the phone keeps ringing.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: (sleepy) Somebody get that! The phone keeps ringing, and Jack finally comes awake and that it's his cellular phone. He pulls it out of his pock

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Hello? We now INTERCUT between Jack and Robert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Robert is sitting at his desk, talking on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Hello, Jack. Quite a show you put on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack sits bolt upright, completely wide awake.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: He was going to die, Robert.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: That was the whole point! I had such plans for you, Jack, and now you've gone and thrown them all away.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: What do we do now?

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: Well, I could let you talk to your girlfriend, and your Mother, but they're a little tied up now. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Sally and Jack's Mother sitting in ch Robert's office, tied to them.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Let them go.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: I don't think so. I'm staging another fight in one hour, Jack, and you're the main attraction. Show up alone, or they're gone. Got that?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: See you soon, Jack. Robert hangs up and smiles at Sally and Jack's Mother.

dialogues.speaker: ROBERT
dialogues.text: That's some guy you have there. He really wants to be a hero.

dialogues.speaker: JACK, WHO HANGS UP HIS END OF THE CONNECTION
dialogues.text: He walks into where Budokai is lying and checks on him. H barely conscious.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: You doing OK? Budokai nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He went for medicine.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Tell him they have Sally and my mother. I'm going into the ring with Robert.

dialogues.speaker: BUDOKAL
dialogues.text: Give him hell. They clasp hands, then Jack leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Warehouse is deserted now

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jack walks into the Warehouse proper, the loudspeaker running a tape.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: . The All American Hero! The taped crowd erupts.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: against the man who started it all, Robert Sawyer! More cheers from the taped crowd. Jack makes his way to the ring, and he notices that Sally mother are the only "crowd," and they are being guarded b Darkcloud, Night Stalker, and Angel. Robert is already there, warming up and watching him.
